spec_data.Name: perl-Config-MVP-Slicer
spec_data.Description:
This Perl module can be used to extract embedded configurations for other
plugins out of larger (parent) configurations.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 04 Sep 2017 07:10:04 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Extract embedded configuration from a parent configuration
